FuncDef:
The radius-server group command creates a RADIUS server group and displays the view of the RADIUS server group.
The undo radius-server group command deletes a RADIUS server group.
By default, the radius server group is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a RADIUS server group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can configure the RADIUS server group in the RADIUS server group view.
You can use this command to change the command view from system view to RADIUS server group view. If you use this command in the existing group, only command view gets changed to RADIUS server group view. If the specific group does not exist, create the group with the name specified.
You can modify or delete a group when the server group is not in use.
Follow-up Procedure
You can verify the group name by using the display radius-server configuration command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
